channel.title: Help with Bluurr's Client!
channel.description:
Okay, so everytime when I log in to my server which is hosted by a friend of mines. I put the IP in and I logged in. But when I log in, it only lasts for 1 second and it logs out by itself. When I try to log in again, it says Your account is already logged in, please wait for 60 seconds and try again.
But when I use Galkon's client, it works. I tried to change client because Galkon's client couldn't add more custom crowns more than 2.
Someone please help me! My Msn is Srhicecube@hotmail.com and I have Teamviewer too.

item.title: Help with Bluurr's Client!
item.dc:creator: @v0idscape v0idscape
item.description:
@v0idscape wrote:

Okay, so everytime when I log in to my server which is hosted by a friend of mines. I put the IP in and I logged in. But when I log in, it only lasts for 1 second and it logs out by itself. When I try to log in again, it says Your account is already logged in, please wait for 60 seconds and try again.

But when I use Galkon’s client, it works. I tried to change client because Galkon’s client couldn’t add more custom crowns more than 2.

Someone please help me! My Msn is Srhicecube@hotmail.com and I have Teamviewer too.

Read full topic
